Why Vudy?

One Complete Package

No guessing. No compromises. No "you need to buy this and that separately." We give you everything: 32kWh of LFP batteries, 800W of solar, and a complete electrical system. One package. One price. Done.

Built by Someone Who Gets It

Vudy isn't owned by a corporation. It's built by someone who believes in energy independence. Someone who understands what it means to own your own power. That changes everything.

LFP Technology, Not Outdated Lead-Acid

Old lead-acid batteries need constant maintenance, waste energy, and die after 5-7 years. LFP is different. It's safer, more efficient, and lasts 20+ years. We use the best technology available.

32kWh Is Real Power

32kWh isn't a marketing number. It's enough to power an average household for a full day (depending on usage). Combined with 800W of solar, you have a system that works year-round.

800W Solar Is Proven

Not oversized marketing. Not undersized penny-pinching. 800W solar is the sweet spot: It charges your 32kWh battery reliably while being cost-effective and installable on most properties.

Professional Installation Included

We don't sell you hardware and wish you luck. We install it. We certify it. We make sure it works. You get a system you can trust.

Long-Term Support

10-year warranty. Annual maintenance. 24/7 support. We're here when you need us. This isn't a one-time transaction—it's a relationship.

Energy Independence Actually Works

With Vudy, you stop paying electricity bills. You stop depending on the grid. You generate your own power. You store it. You use it. That's freedom.

Simple. Direct. Honest.

No upselling. No complicated financing. No hidden fees. One package. One price. Everything you need. Nothing you don't.
